languages.text: Мастер вокса коротко кивает и подсоединяет связки кабелей, спускающиеся из ее затылка, к главной вокс-станции. "О, дух корабля, огради нас от напасти и да не пропусти еретические сигналы!"

traits.locale_text: Мастер Вокса коротко кивает и подсоединяет связки кабелей, спускающиеся из ее затылка, к главной вокс-станции. "О, дух корабля, огради нас от напасти и да не пропусти еретические сигналы!"

languages.text: The Vox Master nods curtly and connects the tangles of cables coming from the back of her head to the main vox-station. "Spirit of the ship, I beseech thee, shield us from this peril and allow not the heretical signals to pass!"
languages.original_text: Мастер вокса коротко кивает и подсоединяет связки кабелей, спускающиеся из ее затылка, к главной вокс-станции. "О, дух корабля, огради нас от напасти и да не пропусти еретические сигналы!"

traits.locale_text: The Vox Master nods curtly and connects the tangles of cables coming from the back of her head to the main vox-station. "O spirit of the ship, shield us from the peril and allow not the heretical signals to pass!"

The Vox Master nods curtly and connects the tangles of cables coming from the back of her head to the main vox-station. "O spirit of the ship, shield us from the peril and allow not the heretical signals to pass!"

The Vox Master nods curtly and connects the tangles of cables coming from the back of her head to the main vox-station. "Spirit of the ship, I beseech thee, shield us from this peril and allow not the heretical signals to pass!"

languages.text: La maestra de vocos asiente brevemente y conecta la maraña de cables que le salen de la nuca a la estación de voco central. «Espíritu de la nave, te lo imploro: ¡protégenos de esta amenaza e impide que las señales herejes pasen!».
languages.original_text: The Vox Master nods curtly and connects the tangles of cables coming from the back of her head to the main vox-station. "Spirit of the ship, I beseech thee, shield us from this peril and allow not the heretical signals to pass!"

traits.locale_text: La maestra de vocos asiente brevemente y conecta la maraña de cables que le salen de la nuca a la estación de voco central. «Espíritu de la nave, te lo imploro: ¡protégenos de esta amenaza e impide que las señales herejes pasen!».

languages.text: 音阵大师简单地点了点头，将后脑勺纠缠在一起的电缆连接到了主音阵站上。“舰船的机魂啊，我恳求你，保护我们免受威胁，不要让异端信号通过！”
languages.original_text: The Vox Master nods curtly and connects the tangles of cables coming from the back of her head to the main vox-station. "Spirit of the ship, I beseech thee, shield us from this peril and allow not the heretical signals to pass!"

traits.locale_text: 音阵大师简单地点了点头，将后脑勺纠缠在一起的电缆连接到了主音阵站上。“舰船的机魂啊，我恳求你，保护我们免受威胁，不要让异端信号通过！”

languages.text: ヴォクス・マスターは淡々とうなずいて、後頭部から出ているゴチャッとしたケーブルをメインのヴォクスステーションに接続した。「船の精霊よ、お願いです、私達をこの危機から守り、異端の信号を止めてください！」
languages.original_text: The Vox Master nods curtly and connects the tangles of cables coming from the back of her head to the main vox-station. "Spirit of the ship, I beseech thee, shield us from this peril and allow not the heretical signals to pass!"

traits.locale_text: ヴォクス・マスターは淡々とうなずいて、後頭部から出ているゴチャッとしたケーブルをメインのヴォクスステーションに接続した。「船の精霊よ、お願いです、私達をこの危機から守り、異端の信号を止めてください！」

languages.text: Die Vox-Meisterin nickt knapp und verbindet das Kabelgewirr, das von ihrem Hinterkopf kommt, mit der Haupt-Vox-Station. "Geist des Schiffes, ich beschwöre dich, schütze uns vor dieser Gefahr und lasse die ketzerischen Signale nicht durch!"
languages.original_text: The Vox Master nods curtly and connects the tangles of cables coming from the back of her head to the main vox-station. "Spirit of the ship, I beseech thee, shield us from this peril and allow not the heretical signals to pass!"

languages.text: La maîtresse-vox acquiesce d'un signe de tête rapide, puis connecte l'amas de câbles qui sort de l'arrière de sa tête au poste-vox principal. « Esprits du vaisseau, je vous en conjure, protégez-nous de ce péril et ne laissez passer aucun signal hérétique ! »
languages.original_text: The Vox Master nods curtly and connects the tangles of cables coming from the back of her head to the main vox-station. "Spirit of the ship, I beseech thee, shield us from this peril and allow not the heretical signals to pass!"

traits.locale_text: La maîtresse-vox acquiesce d'un signe de tête rapide, puis connecte l'amas de câbles qui sort de l'arrière de sa tête au poste-vox principal. « Esprits du vaisseau, je vous en conjure, protégez-nous de ce péril et ne laissez passer aucun signal hérétique ! »

languages.text: Voks Üstadı, kısa bir onay selamının ardından başının arkasından gelen kablo yumaklarını ana voks istasyonuna bağlıyor. "Geminin ruhu, sana yalvarıyorum! Bizi bu tehlikeden koru, sapkın sinyallerin geçmesine izin verme!"
languages.original_text: The Vox Master nods curtly and connects the tangles of cables coming from the back of her head to the main vox-station. "Spirit of the ship, I beseech thee, shield us from this peril and allow not the heretical signals to pass!"

traits.locale_text: Voks Üstadı, kısa bir onay selamının ardından başının arkasından gelen kablo yumaklarını ana voks istasyonuna bağlıyor. "Geminin ruhu, sana yalvarıyorum! Bizi bu tehlikeden koru, sapkın sinyallerin geçmesine izin verme!"
